title: How I Started
description: I consider myself passionate about programming. I started with small Arduino projects,. After that, my interest shifted to web programming, and it was then when I decided to enroll in a Bootcamp to change my profession.

title: During the Bootcamp
description: During the bootcamp, we worked with the JavaScript DOM and later the MERN stack. Upon completion, I realized I needed to continue developing projects to keep learning, so I became interested in React Native, Django, Puppeteer, and Vue.

title: In the Future
description: For the future, I would like to continue learning mathematics, and I also find 3JS and TensorFlow interesting. I feel more prepared and I'm looking forward to finding a job that allows me to continue growing and learning from other programmers.
